body: # wls 1.0 # Web Directory Listing ![wls](https://raw.github.com/prashanta/wls/master/test/screen-1.png) ### About --- __wls__ is a minimalistic approach to directory listing. It has six fundamental features: 1. Multiple sort table 2. Breadcrumb navigation 3. Directory title via .comment file 4. File comments via .comment file 5. Summary of contents in a directory 6. Filter list by file type The entire package is under _300KB_. Demo: http://prashanta.me/wls ### Installation --- Copy the contents of wls to the director that you want to have it managed. All the consequent sub folders will be managed. To add directory title and file comments edit _.comment_ file on respective folder. Yup, thats it. ### Which files are ignored? --- - _index.php_ - Any file/folder that begins with "." ### 3rd Party: --- - __jQuery__: http://jquery.com/ - __Tablesorter__: http://tablesorter.com/
